attributes.action: not add fluoride to the water supply in all areas, and to stop adding fluoride in the areas where it is currently added.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As someone how has an, admittedly mild, allergy to fluoride I definitely do not want it added to the water supply in my area. It should be left up to the individual household as to what is, or is not added to their drinking water.
